item.title: CVE-2024-37447|2024-08-02T03:57:38.905Z -- pixelyoursite -- pixelyoursite%20%E2%80%93%20your%20smart%20pixel%20%28tag%29%20manager
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in PixelYourSite PixelYourSite – Your smart PIXEL (TAG) Manager allows Stored XSS.This issue affects PixelYourSite – Your smart PIXEL (TAG) Manager: from n/a through 9.6.1.1.
